description:
A handy stick clip for hanging or retrieving quickdraws, or clipping a rope into pre-hung draws to protect a climber from a potential ground fall. The simple design can be used with any non-locking climbing carabiner.

  • Made from stainless spring steel for long-lasting stick clipping
  • Threaded end fits standard painter's or window-washer's poles
name: Metolius Superclip Stick Clip
